Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Central
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Laramie and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Laramie and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier single train delay at O'Hare. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier single train delay at O'Hare. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
